name: Ninja Platformer 2
description:
Adjust the power level, jump from platform to platform, earn more rewards on your challenging run and customize your game experience! Arcade game with a simple play style. Gets harder each jump. Can you beat the challenge?

6 Supported Languages:

- English

- Turkish

- Italian

- French

- German

- Spanish

New features each week!

Thanks for playing.

by Uniqport Games
